title: 正版登陸器打開出現Java Virtual Machine Launcher的問題
author: CJ小超
txt_content:
Error：Unable to access jarfile D：\？？？？\\desktop\Minecraft.exe 的問題??




求正版的回答

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content: 你确定装了Java？还是你装Java的路径改了？

replies.author: xjboss
replies.txt_content: 似乎是乱码？应该是不支持中文路径，你改改

replies.author: CJ小超
replies.txt_content:
YZC 发表于 2014-1-26 12:04
你确定装了Java？还是你装Java的路径改了？
好吧.. 沒事呢.. 不關JAVA的事
